biotools.summary: Coordinated Panel Visualization for Biological Networks Analysis | CroP – Coordinated Panels Visualization | The Computational Design and Visualization Lab focuses on multidisciplinary research bringing together Computer Science, Graphic Design and New Media Art | CroP is a visualization tool aimed at highlighting patterns of data in networks integrated with temporal data and analyzing their behaviors over time through dynamic visualization models in a coordinated multiple views layout
